data.description: Econometric methods, theory, and applications. Matrix algebra will be used. Topics include linear regression, least-squares estimation, inference, and hypothesis testing. Primarily for Master's level students. It is expected that students will have completed three semesters calculus (such asMATH 234) and linear algebra (such asMATH 340).
data.title: ECONOMETRICS I

data.description: Introduction to econometric analysis of financial time series. Covers linear econometric time series models, multivariate time series, volatility estimation, and estimating and testing financial econometric models.
data.title: FINANCIAL ECONOMETRICS
